Example #1

$('#test1').nutritionLabel({
	'showItemName' : false,

	'valueServingUnitQuantity' : 2.3,
	'valueServingSize' : 6,
	'valueServingSizeUnit' : 'DONUTS',
	'valueServingWeightGrams' : 23.65,

	'showLegacyVersion' : false
});



Example #2

$('#test2').nutritionLabel({
	'showItemName' : true,

	'valueServingUnitQuantity' : 2.3,
	'valueServingSize' : 6,
	'valueServingSizeUnit' : 'DONUTS',
	'valueServingWeightGrams' : 23.65,

	'showLegacyVersion' : false
});



Example #3

$('#test3').nutritionLabel({
	'showItemName' : false,

	'valueServingUnitQuantity' : 2.3,
	'valueServingSize' : 6,
	'valueServingSizeUnit' : '',
	'valueServingWeightGrams' : 23.65,

	'showLegacyVersion' : false
});



Example #4

$('#test4').nutritionLabel({
	'showItemName' : true,

	'valueServingUnitQuantity' : 2.3,
	'valueServingSize' : 6,
	'valueServingSizeUnit' : '',
	'valueServingWeightGrams' : 23.65,

	'showLegacyVersion' : false
});
